patterns: Which courses do you have in engineering?
What kinds of courses are there in engineering?
What do you teach in engineering?
What courses you have?
What courses you offer?
What courses you have?
responses: We teach computer science, electronics, electrical, biotech, civil engineering courses
We have computer science, electronics, electrical, biotech, civil engineering courses

patterns: How much fees do you charge?
What is the fees for engineering course?
How much fees for computer science engineering?
How much fees for electronics engineering?
How much fees for electrical engineering?
How much fees for civil engineering?
responses: The fees for this course is around 1,80,000 per year
We charge around 1,80,000 per year plus scholarship deductions

patterns: When does the new session start?
When do you start classes for first year?
When do you start lecture for first semester?

responses: New Session will begin from 1st september
First year lectures will start from 1st september

patterns: Do you have hostels?
Does the university have hostel facility?
Are there hostel in the college?
Do you provide hostel faciliy?
Do the university have AC hostel rooms?
responses: Yes, the university have hostel facility with separate AC/Non AC rooms
The university provides hostels rooms with AC and non AC room based on requirement

patterns: What is the hostel fees for non ac rooms?
What is the fees for hostel?
How much fees you charge for hostel?
How much fees for ac hostel rooms?
What is the fees for ac rooms in hostel?
responses: We charge 90,000 for Non AC and 50,000 extra for AC room
Fees for Non AC Hostel Room is 90,000 and for AC room you need to pay 50,000 extra
